dialogue: The two arrived at an encampment.
We're here!
Where exactly is 'here'?
Welcome to Trojan!
Or rather, its headquarters.
Headquarters?
Yeah. A group of volunteers came around this planet
and set up this place for people with financial problems.
They could get food, a place to sleep, and support.
Eventually, we, the Militia, turned it into a refugee camp for the war...
The supplies you brought were mostly
a restock of common medicines and supplements.
We were nearly running out, here!
Huh...
I guess it was Shandy who hired you?
He sent me a telegram about it earlier.
Sorry, you must've been worried about
what stuff you were actually delivering!
I can't deny that. He was really shady when he came up to me.
Haha. Here, I should give you the rest of your payment.
Thanks.
Actually...If you're up for it,
we could use more of your help.
This place, you can see how lively it is, can't you?
That's what we're fighting for. Fighting to protect.
So? What's your call?
